title: Lunchbox Calls In Sick To Places He Doesn't Work + Amy Gets Flipped Off
itunes:title: Lunchbox Calls In Sick To Places He Doesn't Work + Amy Gets Flipped Off
description:
Lunchbox calls in sick to restaurants that he doesn't actually work at. Amy did something that made a passerby flip her off. Also, The Girl Group discusses their chest hair preferences.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
